name: GeoFS - Flight Simulator
description:
GeoFS is a multi-player flight simulator displaying a global scenery of satellite images. Whether you are a licensed pilot practicing VFR, an aviation enthusiast or just looking for some fun flying in beautiful landscapes, you can enjoy any of the 10 available aircraft, ranging from para-glider to airliners, absolutely anywhere in the world.

This app includes:

- Worldwide (10m resolution) satellite images and elevation model
- Global multiplayer
- Navigation map with 30,000 referenced runways
- 10 different aircraft with instrumented cockpits
- ADS-B real-life traffic
- Replay mode
- Real-time atmospheric conditions (weather forecast feed)

Available via in-app purchase:
- HD subscription for global high resolution (sub-meter) satellite images.

An internet connection (WiFi recommended) is necessary to run GeoFS.
